name: DOCS_RCVD_DISP_RXCMTS
description: The table containing comments for the medication in the medication dispensed segment of the external e-prescription, received through the incoming e-prescribing interface.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MED_DISP_MED_CMTS
columns.description: The comments for the medication of the external e-prescription received through the e-prescribing interface.
